Installation¶

Install with pip¶

cfunits is in PyPI:

$ pip install cfunits

Install from source¶

Downloads are available from PyPI or from the bitbucket repository. Installation instructions and dependencies are in the README.md file.

Issues¶

Please raise any questions or problems through the cfunits issue tracker.
